key.name: last-screenshot-save-folder
key.description: Wether to remember the last used option for screenshot save folder

key.name: screenshot-delay
key.description: Number of seconds to wait before taking the screenshot

key.name: last-screenshot-delay
key.description: Wether to remember the last used option for screenshot delay

key.name: screenshot-mode
key.description: Default option selected for screenshot mode

key.name: last-screenshot-mode
key.description: Wether to remember the last used option for screenshot mode

key.name: include-pointer
key.description: Whether to include the mouse pointer in the screenshot

key.name: last-include-pointer
key.description: Wether to remember the last used option for include pointer

key.name: window-wait
key.description: Number of seconds to wait for the window to close before taking the screenshot

key.name: capture-backend
key.description: The backend preferred by the user for capturing screenshots (SHELL, X11, GRIM)

key.name: capture-backend-auto
key.description: The backend that is actually used for capturing screenshots, automatically determined based on availability.

key.name: hide-window
key.description: Wether to hide window at screen capture (true for hiding and false for not hiding)

key.name: enable-flash
key.description: Whether to show a flash effect when taking a screenshot

key.name: show-notification
key.description: Whether to show a desktop notification after taking a screenshot
